item.title: Django: Ordering by Linked List for Model Objects
item.description: Linked list is a data structure where each object has points to next. In django, linked list can provide an interesting solution when it comes to custom ordering/grouping issues. Lets think of an example like this= you are making a blog site, and you have made a Post Model like this:
